title: Service disruption on Circle Line due to power fault

title_translations.zh-Hans: 因电力故障导致环线上服务中断
title_translations.ms: Gangguan perkhidmatan di Laluan Bulat kerana kerosakan kuasa
title_translations.ta: மின்சாரக் கோளாறு காரணமாக வட்டப் பாதையில் சேவை இடையூறு

updates.text: [CCL] CLEARED: Train services between #KentRidge and #HarbourFront are now operating normally.
[CCL]: Estimate 15 mins additional travelling time between #KentRidge and #HarbourFront in both directions due to power fault.
